title: Steamboat Itchy
description: In 1928 and with credit to Chester Lampwick and Roger Meyers, Sr., Itchy and Scratchy star in their first cartoon together.
altHero: Itchy at the helm of a boat (in the style of Steamboat Willy)
alt2: Itchy shoots a gun at Scratchy’s knees
alt3: Itchy kicks Scratchy into the coal engine
alt4: Scratchy’s head is burned to a crisp
